p: The analytical class chemicals, methanol, n-alkanes series (C8-C28), DPPH (2,2-diphenyl-1picrylhydrazyl), ABTS (2,2â€²-azinobis (3-ethylbenzothiazoline-6-sulfonic acid)), ascorbic acid, trolox (6-hydroxy-2,5,7,8-tetramethylchroman-2 carboxylic acid), butylated hydroxy anisole (BHA), butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT), anhydrous sodium sulfate (Na 2SO 4), and potassium persulfate (K 2S 2O 8) were procured from Sigma-Aldrich (St. Louis, MO, USA).
